content: Following a suggestion by @Anne Baanen I have split the file RatFuncin several ones and I'd like to have a review of #12425 so that I can keep PRÃ­ng things about completions of Laurent Series

Marginally related to this PR: I just changed move-decls to that it would have reported explicitly that no declaration was lost in this PR: #12932.

In the PR, you can also see what the bot reports on files that do not add/remove declarations (hence what it would have reported on the PR in this thread).
